alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 1:35PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... South Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 1235 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms repeatedly moving over the same areas. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have already fallen in a short period of time. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Goulding, Myrtle Grove, Brownsville, Avondale, Bellview, Beach Haven, Olive, Pleasant Grove, Quinavista, Seaglades and Chanticleer.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
